cz.ive.gui
Interface GraphicInfo

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGraphicInfo, ActorGraphicInfo, AnimatedGraphicInfo, DelegatedGraphicInfo, WayPointGraphicInfo
public interface GraphicInfo
extends java.io.Serializable

Iface representing object specific informations for proper visualisation. This might be info about actual object animation frame, actual process state and so on. All successors should have constructor with the same parameters as in the AbstractGraphic info class, to be compatible with the DelegatedGraphicInfo.

Author:
Ondra

Method Detail

draw

void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D canvas,
          Viewpoint view,
          java.awt.Point offset)
Draws object on the given canvas using a viewpoint for correct position and scale retrieval. The drawing should be offseted by a given vector.

Parameters:
canvas - graphical canvas where to draw the object
view - graphical viewpoint associted with the calling GUI
offset - drawing offset

getBoundingBox

java.awt.Rectangle getBoundingBox(Viewpoint view,
                                  java.awt.Point offset)
Retrieves bounding box of this object in given Viewpoint. The bounding box should be offseted by a give vector.

Parameters:
view - Graphical viewpoint associated with the calling GUI
offset - bounding box offset.
Returns:
rectangular bounding box of this object

getObjectAtPosition

IveObject getObjectAtPosition(Viewpoint view,
                              java.awt.Point offset,
                              java.awt.Point p)
Retrieves object at the given position. This is either associated object or one of its slaves.

Parameters:
view - Graphical viewpoint associated with the calling GUI
offset - bounding box offset.
p - the position we are interested in.
Returns:
object at the given position.
